channel.title: Armour set
channel.description:
While in Science/Humanitys class, i got bored and started drawing out an armour set and this is basicly what i came up with. I'll be updateing as i make more armour, hope you enjoy it. :)
[IMG]http://i1183.photobucket.com/albums/x470/0acer0/stuff/gladiatorchest.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1183.photobucket.com/albums/x470/0acer0/stuff/gladiatorchest2.jpg[/img]
[b]EDIT 1:[/b]
[IMG]http://i1183.photobucket.com/albums/x470/0acer0/stuff/gladiator-chestwire.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1183.photobucket.com/albums/x470/0acer0/stuff/gladiator-side.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1183.photobucket.com/albums/x470/0acer0/stuff/gladiator-sidewire.jpg[/img]
[b]EDIT 2:[/b]
[IMG]http://i1183.photobucket.com/albums/x470/0acer0/stuff/gladiator-plate2.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1183.photobucket.com/albums/x470/0acer0/stuff/gladiator-plate3.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1183.photobucket.com/albums/x470/0acer0/stuff/gladiator-legs.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1183.photobucket.com/albums/x470/0acer0/stuff/gladiator-legs2.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1183.photobucket.com/albums/x470/0acer0/stuff/gladiatorset2.jpg[/img]
[b]EDIT 3:[/b]
[IMG]http://i1183.photobucket.com/albums/x470/0acer0/stuff/gladiatorlegs2.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1183.photobucket.com/albums/x470/0acer0/stuff/gladiatorlegs3.jpg[/img]
[b]EDIT 4:[/b]
[IMG]http://i1183.photobucket.com/albums/x470/0acer0/stuff/gladiator-chainmail.jpg[/img]
[b]EDIT 5 (last edit):[/b]
[IMG]http://i1183.photobucket.com/albums/x470/0acer0/stuff/gladiator-1.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1183.photobucket.com/albums/x470/0acer0/stuff/gladiator-2.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1183.photobucket.com/albums/x470/0acer0/stuff/gladiator-3.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1183.photobucket.com/albums/x470/0acer0/stuff/gladiator-6.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1183.photobucket.com/albums/x470/0acer0/stuff/gladiator-5.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1183.photobucket.com/albums/x470/0acer0/stuff/gladiator-4.jpg[/img]
Thanks for the great comments, i appreciate it. :)

item.title: Armour set
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Add subdivision to it just for the lulz? Looks like your topology is okay, so it should look fine. Might have to add a few loop cuts in there to make the cuts look crisper.

item.description:

I was thinking more like you want it in

Edit: Anyways, i found a tut on here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=426139.0

item.title: Armour set
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“The Arcanian, post:52, topic:383892”][quote author=amy_webb link=topic=479651.msg3519485#msg3519485 date=1299293644]

Where is the download link?! Great job Amy. Would love to see some pictures of this ingame.

Sadly, there isn’t a download link because it wont work ingame. The chest goes over the 2000 polly without being triangled.
[/quote]

I remember i had a model over 3k polys in my client. Can’t find the tutorial now. But you can change the max polly amount the client will hold. (Not sure about the consequences));[/quote]
Ah k, well if you ever find that tutorial again ill give you the model to put it in (if you want it).

Read full topic

item.title: Armour set
item.dc:creator: @The_Arcanian The Arcanian
item.description:
@The_Arcanian wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:46, topic:383892”][quote author=RiiPiiNFtW link=topic=479651.msg3519481#msg3519481 date=1299293024]
Where is the download link?! Great job Amy. Would love to see some pictures of this ingame.
[/quote]
Sadly, there isn’t a download link because it wont work ingame. The chest goes over the 2000 polly without being triangled.[/quote]

I remember i had a model over 3k polys in my client. Can’t find the tutorial now. But you can change the max polly amount the client will hold. (Not sure about the consequences));

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

Lazyness:

Everything is flippin awesome in this except for that horrid skirt! Haha. It looks like something from Minecraft lol. Sorry if I offend but in all seriousness… This armor set blows my mind.

Its a tassets, ever seen bandos? Its cool though, your opinion and i respect that.

item.description:

This model would look sooo much cooler if it wasn’t made for RSPS… The concept is amazing…

I normally don’t make models based on RSPS but i just convert the idea onto it, if you get what i mean?
[/quote]
well then make your models higher poly :)[/quote]
Too lazy.
